actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to exempt certain defense-related articles from the preferential tariff treatment accorded to articles imported for exhibition at trade fairs.

summary.text: Amends the Trade Fair Act of 1959 to exempt designated defense articles and military goods detrimental to U.S. national security from the preferential duty treatment of articles imported for exhibition at trade fairs.

titles.title: A bill to exempt certain defense-related articles from the preferential tariff treatment accorded to articles imported for exhibition at trade fairs.
